Hoboken.Monastery and Church of Saint Michael th: The Monastery and Church of Saint Michael the Archangel is a state and national historic place in Union City, Hudson County, New Jersey, United States. Formally opened in 1869 and completed in 1875, the grounds of the complex are bounded West Street and Summit Avenue between 18th and 21st Streets. The small street leading to its front entrance from the east is called Monastery Place.
